messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] cleaning co-op
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/8/00 11:13:37 AM Central Daylight Time, hape2day@yahoo.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/8/00 11:13:37 AM Central Daylight Time,
hape2day@... writes:

<< said that she knows a bunch of women who get
together and have a cleaning co-op. Kinda like I'll
help you clean your house if you help me clean mine.
She said that before she knew they were doing this she
was embarrassed because their houses were so much
cleaner than hers. Now that she knows she doesn't feel
so bad.
>>
Not a bad idea, except that people like me wouldn't be able to do it-- I'd
*have* to clean it before they came over to help clean!! lol! :) ~Karen
